original_title: 禁断の放課後 女教師と生徒の背徳ベロキス性交 明里つむぎ
overview: Tsumugi Akari is a female teacher who gets assigned to an all-boys school. She is quite scared of the place because she is afraid of bad guys and she has a bullying past.  However, she finds another student named Yamaoka who is kind-hearted and with who she feels a special connection.
title: After School Taboo: Immoral French Kisses and Sex Between a Female Teacher and Her Student
